alert.note: Alert for Clearfield; Columbia; Montour; Northern Centre; Northern Clinton; Northern Lycoming; Northumberland; Schuylkill; Snyder; Southern Centre; Southern Clinton; Southern Lycoming; Sullivan; Union (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 3:34AM EST until February 22 at 3:00PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 3 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of up to one half inch and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of central Pennsylvania. Maximum snow and ice accumulations in the higher elevations north of Interstate 80. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 3 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Locally hazardous travel and slippery conditions especially on bridges, overpasses, and untreated secondary roads. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wintry mix will turn to rain during the afternoon.
info.instruction: The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Call 5 1 1 or visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway and traffic conditions. To report snow or ice, post to the NWS State College Facebook page, use Twitter @NWSStateCollege, or visit weather.gov/ctp.
